attributes.action: Label the following groups as terrorist organisations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the Home Secretary labels the Iranian Revolutionary Guard and the Provisional IRA as terrorist organisations, and demands that the EU does likewise. These groups have not renounced violence; they cannot be ignored.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
